name: zap_recall_api
description: Api para a aplicação zap recall

scripts.seed: npm run prod:load-envs prisma db seed
scripts.migration:generate: npm run prod:load-envs prisma migrate dev
scripts.test:migration:run: npm run test:load-envs prisma migrate deploy
scripts.test:migration:generate: npm run test:load-envs prisma migrate dev
scripts.test:seed: npm run test:load-envs prisma db seed
scripts.dev:migration:run: npm run dev:load-envs prisma migrate deploy
scripts.dev:migration:generate: npm run dev:load-envs prisma migrate dev
scripts.dev:seed: npm run dev:load-envs prisma db seed
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch src/ --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/server.ts
scripts.dev:studio: npm run dev:load-envs npx prisma studio

author: Juan Sued
